resource: 1002027.derived=false 1002027.description=Covers factory scheduled service. Plan is 2 years or 25,000 miles, whichever occurs first. The new Toyota vehicle cannot be a part of a rental or commercial fleet or livery or taxi vehicle. See plan for complete coverage details. See participating Toyota dealer for details. Offer ends 6/1/10. 1002027.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002027.vtc=true
